about_the_game:
Master Your Aim with Sticks – The Ultimate Controller-Optimized Aim Trainer! 

Sticks is the most customizable aim trainer built for controllers, designed to help you fine-tune your skills with precision. Featuring a cross-platform workshop, you can share and discover community-made settings to match the feel of your favorite FPS games or create your own from scratch. Customize rotation rates, aim acceleration, curves, smoothing, and more for a tailored experience.

You can also train with a mouse and keyboard, but Sticks truly shines when it comes to giving players full control over controller settings, empowering you to elevate your gameplay.

Cross-Platform Workshop

Create, share, and discover custom game profiles, playlists, weapons, and response curves with the Cross-Platform Workshop. Players from all platforms can upload and download each other’s setups, making it easier than ever to find the perfect settings for your favorite games.

  • Share custom aim profiles and playlists.

  • Access a library of curated weapon settings.

  • Experiment with community-made response curves for popular games.

Advanced Aim Assist System

Our Aim Assist System gives you the tools to replicate and master various aim assist mechanics found in competitive shooters. Fine-tune your settings to match real-world conditions and take full advantage of every tool available.

  • Friction

  • Magnetism

  • Motion Tracking:

  • Aim Compensation

Curve Editor

Perfect your controller response with the fully-featured Curve Editor, allowing you to match the exact feel of different games' aim response curves and aim acceleration curves.

  • Customize your aim acceleration and response curves to replicate popular shooter games.

  • Use built-in presets or create your own curves to fit your playstyle.

  • Experiment with different curves to see what feels most natural for your thumbstick control.

Controller Customization

Sticks Aim Trainer offers deep customization of your controller settings to match any game or personal preference. Fine-tune sensitivity, dead zones, and even response curves, all with real-time feedback.

name: Sticks Aim Trainer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 (4 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a controller for optimal performance
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Sticks The Ultimate Controller-Optimized Trainer, is the most customizable aim trainer built for controllers, designed to help you fine-tune your skills. Featuring a cross-platform workshop, you can share and discover community-made settings to match the feel of your favorite FPS games.
supported_languages:
English*, Italian, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, German
*languages with full audio support
